          <title>
            <string language="en">Ice to steam flowchart</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eis, zum des Flußdiagramms zu dämpfen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Glace pour cuire l'organigramme à la vapeur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gelo para cozinhar o fluxograma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ghiaccio per cuocere a vapore diagramma di flusso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πάγος στο διάγραμμα ροής ατμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hielo para cocer al vapor el organigrama</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This incomplete flowchart shows the processes by which ice is turned into steam. This can be used in a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">boiling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Liquid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">melting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Solid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">steam</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses unvollständige Flußdiagramm zeigt die 
Prozesse, durch die Eis zu Dampf gemacht wird. Dieses kann in 
einer beschriftenden Übung verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet organigramme inachevé montre les processus 
par lesquels de la glace est transformée en vapeur. Ceci peut 
être utilisé dans un exercice étiquetant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este fluxograma incompleto mostra os processos por
que o gelo é girado no vapor. Isto pode ser usado em um 
exercício etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo diagramma di flusso incompleto mostra i 
processi tramite cui il ghiaccio è trasformato in vapore. Ciò 
può essere usata in un'esercitazione identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το ελλιπές διάγραμμα ροής εμφανίζει τις 
διαδικασίες από τις οποίες ο πάγος μετατρέπεται σε ατμό. 
Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί σε μια άσκηση μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este organigrama incompleto muestra los procesos 
por los cuales el hielo es dado vuelta en el vapor. Esto se 
puede utilizar en un ejercicio de etiquetado.</string>
          </description>
